home.p: I am a passionate full stack developer. I have learned skills in front-end technologies like React, as well as back-end technologies like Node js, MySQL and PostgresSQL. My goal is to leverage my knowledge to create innovative solutions that drive business growth and deliver exceptional user experiences

abtme.p1: Hello my name is Jose Maria, I am an administrator as my first profession. My passion for programming started after the pandemic.
abtme.p2: Although my first approach in the programming field was when I took an excel macros course in college, it was only in 2022 that I was able to experiment with technologies such as Visual Studio Code, Javascript and some Python.
abtme.p3: Programming is a field full of opportunities and continuous learning in which I want to go deeper.

projects.p: During the learning of technologies for both front-end and back-end I was able to develop some projects applying what I learned.
projects.p1: Backend development for e-commerce involves the creation of a series of endpoints that facilitate user management, the login process, product viewing and filtering, as well as the functionality to add items to the cart and make purchases.
projects.p2: For the project we developed an application with random phrases and images when clicking on a button. Concepts such as components, handle events(onClick) and props were applied.
projects.p3: In this project we make use of an api to bring data about weather, location, among others, applying hooks like useEffect, useState and asynchronous requests.
projects.p4: A web application that allows us to see all the characters of the Rick and Morty series by location. Conditional rendering, error handling, paging and useFetch are applied.
projects.p5: A web application that allows us to interact with a Users API, through all http methods. HTTP methods (get, create, delete, update) and props practice are applied.
projects.p6: A web page is created to view the information of each pokemon, react router and redux are applied.
projects.p7: The purpose is to create an e-commerce that has everything related to it, but now connected directly to a backend. You can see product filtering, shopping cart and purchase history.

skills.p: In the learning process i used various applications and technologies for the full stack development of web pages.

contact.p: Don´t hesitate! Drop me a line and I´ll get back to you ASAP!.
contact.name: Your Name
